components.label: Apply for Leave

components.title: Review
components.label: Review
Submit Action
Current User
components.customDefaultValue: const localdata = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('UserDetails')); const preferredUsername = localdata.preferred_username; value = preferredUsername;

components.label: Current User Role
components.customDefaultValue: const localdata = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('UserDetails')); const preferredUserRole = localdata.role; value = preferredUserRole;

workflows.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<bpmn:definitions xmlns:bpmn="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL" xmlns:bpmndi="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/DI" xmlns:dc="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DC" xmlns:camunda="http://camunda.org/schema/1.0/bpmn" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:di="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DI" id="Definitions_0993co4" targetNamespace="http://bpmn.io/schema/bpmn" exporter="Camunda Modeler" exporterVersion="4.12.0">
  <bpmn:process id="sampleleave" name="sampleleave" isExecutable="true" camunda:versionTag="1">
    <bpmn:startEvent id="StartEvent_1" name="Start Request">
      <bpmn:outgoing>SequenceFlow_0ociprs</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:startEvent>
    <bpmn:userTask id="reviewer" name="Review Submission" camunda:candidateGroups="${candidateGroup}">
      <bpmn:extensionElements>
        <camunda:formData>
          <camunda:formField id="action" label="Action" type="string"/>
        </camunda:formData>
        <camunda:taskListener event="complete">
          <camunda:script scriptFormat="javascript">task.execution.setVariable('applicationStatus', task.execution.getVariable('action'));
task.execution.setVariable('deleteReason', "completed");</camunda:script>
        </camunda:taskListener>
      </bpmn:extensionElements>
      <bpmn:incoming>SequenceFlow_0ociprs</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>Flow_0p5r07h</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:userTask>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="SequenceFlow_0ociprs" sourceRef="StartEvent_1" targetRef="reviewer">
      <bpmn:extensionElements>
        <camunda:executionListener event="take">
          <camunda:script scriptFormat="javascript">execution.setVariable('applicationStatus', 'New');</camunda:script>
        </camunda:executionListener>
        <camunda:executionListener class="org.camunda.bpm.extension.hooks.listeners.BPMFormDataPipelineListener" event="take">
          <camunda:field name="fields">
            <camunda:expression>["applicationId","applicationStatus"]</camunda:expression>
          </camunda:field>
        </camunda:executionListener>
        <camunda:executionListener class="org.camunda.bpm.extension.hooks.listeners.ApplicationStateListener" event="take"/>
        <camunda:executionListener class="org.camunda.bpm.extension.hooks.listeners.FormBPMFilteredDataPipelineListener" event="take"/>
        <camunda:executionListener event="take">
          <camunda:script scriptFormat="javascript">tenantKey = execution.getVariable("tenantKey");
if(tenantKey){        
candidateGroup = tenantKey + "-formsflow-reviewer";
}
else{                          candidateGroup = "formsflow/formsflow-reviewer";
}          execution.setVariable("candidateGroup", candidateGroup);</camunda:script>
        </camunda:executionListener>
      </bpmn:extensionElements>
    </bpmn:sequenceFlow>
    <bpmn:endEvent id="EndEvent_03cla68" name="End">
      <bpmn:incoming>SequenceFlow_00bn1p7</bpmn:incoming>
    </bpmn:endEvent>
    <bpmn:task id="Task_1hko8r7" name="Update Application Status">
      <bpmn:extensionElements>
        <camunda:executionListener class="org.camunda.bpm.extension.hooks.listeners.ApplicationStateListener" event="end"/>
        <camunda:executionListener class="org.camunda.bpm.extension.hooks.listeners.BPMFormDataPipelineListener" event="start">
          <camunda:field name="fields">
            <camunda:expression>["applicationId","applicationStatus"]</camunda:expression>
          </camunda:field>
        </camunda:executionListener>
        <camunda:executionListener class="org.camunda.bpm.extension.hooks.listeners.FormSubmissionListener" event="start"/>
      </bpmn:extensionElements>
      <bpmn:incoming>Flow_0p5r07h</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>SequenceFlow_00bn1p7</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:task>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="SequenceFlow_00bn1p7" sourceRef="Task_1hko8r7" targetRef="EndEvent_03cla68"/>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="Flow_0p5r07h" sourceRef="reviewer" targetRef="Task_1hko8r7"/>
  </bpmn:process>
  <bpmn:message id="Message_1ihrno3" name="Message_Email"/>
  <bpmndi:BPMNDiagram id="BPMNDiagram_1">
    <bpmndi:BPMNPlane id="BPMNPlane_1" bpmnElement="sampleleave">
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="_BPMNShape_StartEvent_2" bpmnElement="StartEvent_1">
        <dc:Bounds x="179" y="99" width="36" height="36"/>
        <bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
          <dc:Bounds x="163" y="142" width="69" height="14"/>
        </bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="UserTask_0l4y66o_di" bpmnElement="reviewer">
        <dc:Bounds x="300" y="77" width="100" height="80"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="EndEvent_03cla68_di" bpmnElement="EndEvent_03cla68">
        <dc:Bounds x="672" y="99" width="36" height="36"/>
        <bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
          <dc:Bounds x="680" y="142" width="20" height="14"/>
        </bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="Task_0fde0ul_di" bpmnElement="Task_1hko8r7">
        <dc:Bounds x="490" y="77" width="100" height="80"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="SequenceFlow_0ociprs_di" bpmnElement="SequenceFlow_0ociprs">
        <di:waypoint x="215" y="117"/>
        <di:waypoint x="300" y="117"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="SequenceFlow_00bn1p7_di" bpmnElement="SequenceFlow_00bn1p7">
        <di:waypoint x="590" y="117"/>
        <di:waypoint x="672" y="117"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="Flow_0p5r07h_di" bpmnElement="Flow_0p5r07h">
        <di:waypoint x="400" y="117"/>
        <di:waypoint x="490" y="117"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
    </bpmndi:BPMNPlane>
  </bpmndi:BPMNDiagram>
</bpmn:definitions>
